title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, December 9, 2019
description: On this date in 1979, the smallpox virus was declared eradicated. It remains the only disease eliminated by science.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this date in 1979, the smallpox virus was declared eradicated. It remains the only disease eliminated by science.
